*div1 type="summary"* *p*James Clark to Austin, Rushville, 111., March 14, 1832. Introducing Thomas Christian and asking for information about Texas.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Rushville, Illinois*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="03-14-1832">March 14, 1832*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dr. Sir,*/p*
*p*It is probable that the lapse of many years, and the necessary attention to business have effaced all recollection of even my name; I once had however the pleasure of an introduction to you which I have not forgotten, for public fame in your *location_mentioned*native Country*/location_mentioned* has so constantly kept you before me associated with every act of kindness of encouragement and support to your former *person_mentioned*fellow citizens*/person_mentioned* that you must needs be remembered— I have presumed to trespass upon your attention for the purpose of introducing to your acquaintance *person_mentioned*Mr Thomas Christian*/person_mentioned* who will hand you this letter. He is a *person_mentioned*native of *location_mentioned*Virginia */location_mentioned**/person_mentioned*and has resided for some years in this State in the peaceful persuits of a *person_mentioned*Farmer*/person_mentioned*—- I think I know him well and hazard nothing in saying that in steadiness of habits in integrity and honour he yields to no *person_mentioned*citizen */person_mentioned*of our *location_mentioned*Country*/location_mentioned*. His circumstances are easy tho not affluent and he seeks in your *location_mentioned*Country */location_mentioned*under a climate more congenial an asylum from the cold of the *location_mentioned*North*/location_mentioned*— Such a man I should regard as no doubt you do an acquisition to any *location_mentioned*Country*/location_mentioned*; and any kindness or attention the generosity of your character may dispose you to show him or his *person_mentioned*family */person_mentioned*consisting of a *person_mentioned*wife */person_mentioned*and several small *person_mentioned*children */person_mentioned*I am sure will be most gratefully felt and acknowledged— If you can spare the time to write to one so almost a mere *person_mentioned*stranger */person_mentioned*it would afford me much pleasure— Every thing relative to your *location_mentioned*Country */location_mentioned*interests me much particularly its Government, soil, productions, Exports, imports, climate, seasons, water etc and a letter embracing these topics or some or any of them, or any other would gratify me much— Be pleased to pardon this intrusion and believe me to be*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*James Clark*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*[Addressed:] The *person_mentioned*Honbl S. Austin*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned* */p* */div1*
